ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.controller

Class IVP

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.controller.IVP

  • public class IVP
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores an IVP, which is an ODE together with initial conditions.
